United States Court of Appeals
                     For the First Circuit


No. 02-2701

                       CHRISTOPHER MUNOZ,

                     Petitioner, Appellant,

                               v.

                         UNITED STATES,

                      Respondent, Appellee.


                          ERRATA SHEET

     The opinion of this Court issued on May 29, 2003 is
corrected as follows:

     On page 3, line 14, change "F.2d" to "F.3d"
